name: Bad Mothershippers
description:
Bad Mothershippers

Only a bullet-hell can win a bullet-hell. 

Become the Baddest Mothershipper-bullet hell machine on Earth as you gain levels and fight your way through this action-packed roguelike. Defeat tough enemies, obstacles and a final boss to gain fame and glory across all universes!

Procedural roguelike - No playthrough is same.

Play Aggressive - Gain levels by comboing the enemies to oblivion.  Be fast as your XP decreases until you level up!

Play Smart - You have only four slots on your ship, so choose your upgrades wisely.

<HOW TO PLAY>

WASD - Move, Space - Dodge. 

<BULLET HELL JAM SUBMISSION>

Done within April 15th 2022 at 7:00 PM to April 25th 2022 at 7:00 PM

Theme: Constrained - Constrained in time (Decreasing XP mechanic), Constrained Weapon Slots

Credits: Programming, Art, Game Design, SFX, VFX and music were made by us (2 Person team).
